alert.note: Alert for Macomb; Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 9:42PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Oakland and northwestern Macomb Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 942 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Imlay City to Metamora to near Davison. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Oxford around 1015 PM EDT. Romeo around 1020 PM EDT. Pontiac around 1030 PM EDT. Rochester around 1045 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Rochester Hills, Keego Harbor, Lakeville, Waterford, Ray Center, Lake Orion, Sylvan Lake, Washington, Auburn Hills and Lake Angelus. A gust front will procede the actual rainfall with gusty winds of 40 to 50 mph possible. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
